item.title: Add missing books to iTunes
item.description: These days i read most books on my ipad. The problem is that iTunes does not seem to add pdf files when i choose ‘Add Folder’ to the library. So here is a small application that adds them one by one (way too lazy/unmotivated to do this by hand). https://gist.github.com/2759128

item.title: Some tips for .Net developers using git on cygwin
item.description: Here are some tips that i want to share with fellow .Net developers that use git on cygwin. First of all i defined some aliases in my ~/.bashrc: # open explorer in the current working directory alias explorer='explorer.exe "\`cygpath -aw \"$PWD\"\`"' # invoke MSBuild alias msbuild='/cygdrive/c/Windows/Microsoft.NET/Framework/v4.0.30319/MSBuild.exe&' Because i do not like the TFS source control story i use git-tfs.
